eu.fbk.dkm.pikes.resources

Class NAFFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dkm.pikes.resources.NAFFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Consumer<KAFDocument>

    public final class NAFFilter
extends Object
implements Consumer<KAFDocument>
    A filter for the post-processing of a NAF document.

    The filter, configured and created using the builder pattern (see builder()), performs several optional and configurable operations on a NAFDocumant that is modified in place. For the operations supported please refer to the javadoc of Builder.

    This class is thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public void accept(KAFDocument document)
        Specified by:
        accept in interface Consumer<KAFDocument>

      • filter

        public void filter(KAFDocument document)
        Filters the NAF document specified (the document is modified in-place). Filtering is controlled by the flags specified when creating the NAFFilter object.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to filter

      • builder

        public static final NAFFilter.Builder builder()
        Returns a new configurable Builder for the instantiation of a NAFFilter.
        Returns:
        a new Builder

      • builder

        public static final NAFFilter.Builder builder(@Nullable
                                              Boolean enableAll)
        Returns a new configurable Builder with all NAFFilter features either enabled or disabled, based on the supplied parameter.
        Parameters:
        enableAll - true, to enable all features; false, to disable all features; null, to maintain default settings.
        Returns:
        a new Builder
